name: Color Wars (spruceb)
description:
In this fast-paced 2v2 sports ball game, you must pass to your teammate before you can score! Dash across the court to steal the ball just before the other team makes a winning goal! Lay walls to defend if the ball's already been filled, but be careful, you might just end up blocking your own team.

By Spruce Bondera, Ezra Chung, Dominik Konik, and Krista Victorsen

Requires 4 people and 4 gamepads to play
